price: Anadhani mtu kuwa Sisi hatutaikusanya mifupa yake?
footnotes: Hivyo mtu anadhani baada ya kuwa Sisi tulimuumba naye hakuwa kitu chochote, tutakuja shindwa kuyakusanya mafupa yake yaliyooza na yakatapanyika?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
